renderpass.code:
#define rot(a)  mat2(cos(a+vec4(0,11,33,0)))                // rotation                  
#define T       d = vec2(length(q.xz)-1.,q.y),                         \
                d -= threads(q, atan(d.y,d.x), 20. ),                  \
                t = min(t, length(d -.4* vec2(cos(a),1.7*sin(a)) ) -.6 )            
#define threads(q,d,r) .03*abs(cos(r*(d+atan(q.z,q.x))))    // sub-threads

void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 U)
{
    float t=9.,a; vec2 d;
    vec3  R = iResolution,
          D = normalize(vec3(U+U, -3.5*R.y) - R),           // ray direction
          p = 9./R, q,                                      // marching point along ray 
          M = iMouse.z > 0. ? iMouse.xyz/R -.5: vec3(20,8,0)/1e2*cos(iTime+vec3(0,11,0)); // auto thumbnail
     
    for (O=vec4(1); O.x > 0. && t > .01; O-=.01)
        q = p.yxz,
        q.yz *= rot(.5-6.*M.y),                             // rotations
        q.xz *= rot(2.-6.*M.x), 
        a = .6667*atan(q.z,q.x), T,                         // trefoil       
        a += 2.094, T,
        a += 2.094, T,  
        a = threads(q, 2.*q.y, 10.),                        // main wire
        t = min(t, length(q.xz)+a-.57 ),
        p += .3*t*D;                                        // step forward = dist to obj
    O *= vec4(1,.6,0,1);
}
renderpass.name: Image
